name: 恶魔 猎人 (中文 版) Mo Shou Shi Jie: E Mo Lie Ren
overview: I've never played World of Warcraft, and  I'm afraid I've probably missed its true heyday. Luckily, Shenzhen Nanjing, our favorite Chinese bootleg developer, has the solution to my woes: All the goodness of World of Warcraft, distilled onto the Nintendo Entertainment System! Because that makes sense. I have no doubts that this will be the finest bootleg I've ever played. NO DOUBTS!
